nl.inl.blacklab.search

Class TextPatternTranslator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.TextPatternTranslator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the destination type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextPatternTranslatorSpanQuery, TextPatternTranslatorString

    public abstract class TextPatternTranslator<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface for translating a TextPattern into a different representation. This uses the Visitor design pattern to recursively translate the whole TextPattern tree.

      • expand

        public abstract T expand(T clause,
       boolean expandToLeft,
       int min,
       int max)
        Expand the given clause by a number of tokens, either to the left or to the right. This is used to implement wilcard tokens.
        Parameters:
        clause - the clause to expand
        expandToLeft - if true, expand to the left. If false, expand to the right.
        min - minimum number of tokens to expand the clause
        max - maximum number of tokens to expand the clause
        Returns:
        the resulting clause

      • repetition

        public abstract T repetition(T clause,
           int min,
           int max)
        Repetition of a clause.
        Parameters:
        clause - the repeated clause
        min - the minimum number of times it may be repeated (min 0)
        max - the maximum number of times it may be repeated (-1 for no limit)
        Returns:
        the resulting clause

      • docLevelAndNot

        public abstract T docLevelAndNot(T include,
               T exclude)
        Inclusion/exclusion.
        Parameters:
        include - clause that must occur
        exclude - clause that must not occur
        Returns:
        the resulting clause
